com.ijg.darklight.web.sdk

Class DarklightSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ijg.darklight.web.sdk.DarklightSDK

  • public class DarklightSDK
extends java.lang.Object
    Easy access to the Darklight API
    Version:
    .1
    Author:
    Isaac Grant, Lucas Nicodemus
    See Also:
    DarklightAPI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DarklightSDK()
      Empty constructor requires calling setAPIProtocol() and setAPIServer() at a later time, followed by createAPI(), if the API is to be used.
      DarklightSDK(java.lang.String APIProtocol, java.lang.String APIServer, long APISessionId)
      API constructor: creates API without having to explicitly call createAPI()

    • Constructor Detail

      • DarklightSDK

        public DarklightSDK()
        Empty constructor requires calling setAPIProtocol() and setAPIServer() at a later time, followed by createAPI(), if the API is to be used.

      • DarklightSDK

        public DarklightSDK(java.lang.String APIProtocol,
            java.lang.String APIServer,
            long APISessionId)
        API constructor: creates API without having to explicitly call createAPI()
        Parameters:
        APIProtocol - Protocol to be used by the DarklightAPI
        APIServer - Server to be used by the DarklightAPI
        APISessionId - The API session ID used by the DarklightAPI

    • Method Detail

      • APIReady

        private boolean APIReady()
        Check if the DarklightAPI is ready to be created
        Returns:
        True if the API protocol, server, and session id have been specified

      • createAPI

        public boolean createAPI()
        Create DarklightAPI
        Returns:
        True if an instance of DarklightAPI was successfully created

      • api

        public DarklightAPI api()
        Returns:
        The current instance of DarklightAPI, or if api==null, calls createAPI, and returns api

      • getAPIProtocol

        public java.lang.String getAPIProtocol()
        Returns:
        The protocol used by DarklightAPI

      • setAPIProtocol

        public void setAPIProtocol(java.lang.String APIProtocol)
        Parameters:
        APIProtocol - The protocol to be used by DarklightAPI

      • getAPIServer

        public java.lang.String getAPIServer()
        Returns:
        The server used by DarklightAPI

      • setAPIServer

        public void setAPIServer(java.lang.String APIServer)
        Parameters:
        APIServer - The server to be used by DarklightAPI

      • getAPISessionID

        public long getAPISessionID()
        Returns:
        The session ID used by DarklightAPI

      • setAPISessionID

        public void setAPISessionID(long id)
        Parameters:
        id - The session ID to be used by DarklightAPI

      • toJSONString

        public java.lang.String toJSONString(java.util.HashMap<?,?> map)
        Public utility function to generate a JSON string from a HashMap
        Parameters:
        map - A hash map to be turned into JSON
        Returns:
        A JSON string generated from the passed hash map

      • apiAuth

        public boolean apiAuth(java.lang.String name)
        Get the session key from the Darklight API
        Parameters:
        name - The name to which the session key belongs
        Returns:
        True if the request succeeded

      • apiUpdate

        public boolean apiUpdate(int score,
                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> desc)
        Send a score update to the Darklight API
        Parameters:
        score - The number of fixed issues
        desc - A HashMap with the keys being issue names, values being issue descriptions
        Returns:
        True if the request succeeded
